author: beforeitsnews.com
title: The Media's Dishonest Reporting on the Violence in Israel | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
Hat tip Honest Reporting
One of the most outrageous aspects of the Palestinian latest wave of terror against innocent Israelis is the completely dishonest reporting by the international media, which includes the American media.
In this latest example, an NBC reporter named Ayman Mohyeldin, who is noted for his biased coverage, inaccurately describes the shooting death of a young knife-wielding Palestinian by Israeli police, which he supposedly witnessed.
Except he didnâ€™t see the knife-or decided to leave it out. In fact, he had to be corrected on that fact by his own anchor.
http://honestreporting.com/nbc-news-bias-exposed/
